content: Ok, I was concerned about that, which is why I asked. Why did you simplify the tested module? The mission brief stated that the existing functionality was to be deployed. I'm not mad, just trying to understand what was lost in translation and why? Also, we'll need to make sure we have all existing functionality for all modules unless for some reason we get errors and need to cut something. All the files were designed to work together and main.py and were tested. Revamping all files and simplifying them was not part of the scope as I understood it. Where did the confusion come in?
